com.jcatalog.grailsflow.builder
[Groovy] Class ViewsSectionBuilder

java.lang.Object
  groovy.lang.GroovyObjectSupport
      groovy.util.BuilderSupport
          com.jcatalog.grailsflow.builder.AbstractSectionBuilder
              com.jcatalog.grailsflow.builder.ViewsSectionBuilder

class ViewsSectionBuilder
extends AbstractSectionBuilder

ViewsSectionBuilder class is used to construct VariableView objects from views closure of process definition file. Order of variables in views section specifies order of variables on the UI The result of ViewsSectionBuilder work is: - views: Map of variableName -> variableView. - order: Map of variableName -> variable order.

Authors:
Maria Voitovich
